channel.title: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot
channel.description:
[url]https://www.qj.net/qjnet/news/these-tron-legacy-controllers-look-pretty-cool.html[/url]
Looking slick as fuck they are.

item.title: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Maxey:

Honestly tho, I’d rather they just made the L2 and R2 triggers concave on the stock controller. Just like the triggers in the Xbox controller. In games that require you to hold those triggers pressed, it’s very easy for your fingers to slip out of them.

Racing games, ie Motostorm.

Read full topic
item.source: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot

item.title: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
I just hope they make the xbox controller feel like an xbox controller, and not one of those shitty third party ones that have awkward buttons or triggers or thumbsticks that stick.

Read full topic
item.source: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot

item.title: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
I have never liked Playstation controllers. Xbox controllers have always felt way more comfortable and natural for me (well, except for the giant Duke).

OT: Those controllers are sick. Definitely gonna get one.

Read full topic

item.title: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
mmmm, tactile feelings, rite?

Collision:

lolque

I have to say, I have incredibly sweaty hands, and I have never had a problem with the controller ‘slipping out of my hands’

I was going to say that, but he got dualshock y’kno… sick fuck

item.title: These Tron Legacy controllers look smoking hot
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Only negative is that they’re wired.

I wish the stock Dualshock 3 had a texture surface for better gripping. Sometimes when my hands are sweating, the controller slips out of my hands.
